name: Reminance
description:
Reminance is a game about re-living a date that didn't go so well, and trying to fix the past.
You play as a ghost of yourself with the power to re-wind time by holding space bar.

This game still has a ton of bugs, I really worked down to the wire on this one, but I'm still overall really proud of how it turned out. Let me know what you think!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

Hold space bar to rewind time

Press E to interact with certain objects
